Title: Relates to the applicability of the New York state labor relations act
Summary: Relates to the applicability of the New York state labor relations act if the federal national labor relations board declines jurisdictions it has previously held, determines certain provisions are outside the scope of its duties, cannot execute its duties, or where the national labor relations act is repealed or preempted so as to nullify its effectiveness.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the applicability of the New York state labor relations act
